ReportEditControl¶

class ReportEditControl.ReportEditControl(root: tkinter.Tk)¶

Bases: object

Control class for viewing and verifying extracted VFT reports.

root¶

The main Tk window.

writer¶

A writer to write the extracted VFT reports. Currently, only .csv writer is implemented.

reader¶

A reader to read the extracted VFT reports. Currently only .csv reader is implemented.

views¶

The UI elements of the activity.

curFile¶

The file path to the file being viewed by the user. Currently, this should point to a .csv file.

filelist¶

The VFT reports read from the selected file.

__init__(root: tkinter.Tk)¶

Initializes the control class.

Parameters

root (Tk) – The main Tk window.

back()¶

Return to the previous activity, which is the welcome activity.

displayReport(index: int)¶

Displays the information of a selected VFT report on the user interface

Parameters

index (int) – The index of the report selected in the list

logFieldWarnings()¶

Writes a warning about missing fields in the selected report.

readCsv(filename: str)¶

Loads the VFT reports into the program from a .csv file. The reports are then represented in VFTReport objects and stored in filelist.

Parameters

filename (str) – The path to the file

saveReport()¶

Save the changes to the selected report.

Returns

True if the changes were saved successfully.

Return type

bool

startActivity()¶

Initializes the activity. This should be called right after initializing the control class.

update(newReport: models.VFTReport.VFTReport)¶

Updates the UI after committing the file.

Parameters

newReport (VFTReport) – The new values of the report.

WelcomeControl

views
